name: Helping Hand (itch) (ExtraCrispy)
description:
Following a brutal car accident, a young child finds itself permanently injured, having lost a hand due to extensive trauma. This new loss leaves the child feeling scarred not only physically, but also mentally, having to cope with the new reality of being a ‘freak’, and therefore refuses to wear a prosthetic hand. The hand then has to become a perfect fit for the child, to become liked and accepted by its owner by customizing itself his or her liking.
